Package net.semanticmetadata.lire.imageanalysis

Interface Summary
LireFeature This is the basic interface for all content based features.
 

Class Summary
AutoColorCorrelogram Feature for the AutoCorrelogram based on color as described in Huang, J.; Kumar, S.
BasicFeatures This class computes and quantifies several basic image features like contrast, overall sharpness etc.
CEDD The CEDD feature was created, implemented and provided by Savvas A.
ColorLayout Just a wrapper for the use of LireFeature.
EdgeHistogram Just a wrapper for the use of LireFeature.
FCTH The FCTH feature was created, implemented and provided by Savvas A.
FuzzyColorHistogram  
Gabor Implementation of a Gabor texture features done by Marko Keuschnig & Christian Penz
Fixed 2011-05-10 based on the comments of Arthur Lin.
GeneralColorLayout User: mlux Date: 25.11.2009 Time: 13:54:59
Histogram Created by IntelliJ IDEA.
HSVColorHistogram This class provides a simple color histogram for content based image retrieval.
JCD A joint descriptor joining CEDD and FCTH in one histogram.
JpegCoefficientHistogram  
ScalableColor Just a wrapper for the use of LireFeature.
SimpleColorHistogram This class provides a simple color histogram for content based image retrieval.
SurfFeature Mathias Lux, mathias@juggle.at Date: 29.09.2010 Time: 15:44:14 To change this template use File | Settings | File Templates.
Tamura Implementation of (three) Tamura features done by Marko Keuschnig & Christian Penz
Changes by Ankit Jain (jankit87@gmail.com): histogram length in set string shen72@users.sourceforge.net: bugfixes in math (casting and brackets) Arthur Lin (applefan99@gmail.com) 2011-05-10: fix to avoid NaN Date: 28.05.2008 Time: 11:52:03
 

Enum Summary
AutoColorCorrelogram.ExtractionMethod Defines which algorithm to use to extract the features vector
AutoColorCorrelogram.Mode Defines the available analysis modes: Superfast uses the approach described in the paper, Quarterneighbourhood investigates the pixels in down and to the right of the respective pixel and FullNeighbourhood investigates the whole lot of pixels within maximumDistance of the respective pixel.
HSVColorHistogram.DistanceFunction Lists distance functions possible for this histogram class
HSVColorHistogram.HistogramType Lists possible types for the histogram class
SimpleColorHistogram.DistanceFunction Lists distance functions possible for this histogram class
SimpleColorHistogram.HistogramType Lists possible types for the histogram class
